sentences.en: ...a well-maintained used car with a good resale value.
sentences.cn: …一部维护良好的、可以转卖个好价钱的旧车。

sentences.en: Belinda: 1 Resale value is the key.
sentences.cn: 贝琳达: 转卖价是关键.

sentences.en: Books printed on paper are easily shared and resale resold by anyone.
sentences.cn: 印在纸上的书籍容易被传阅或者转售.

sentences.en: Finally, the Act does not apply toon products sold for resale or for commercial purposes.
sentences.cn: 最后, 这个法案并不适用于为转售或商业目的销售的产品.

sentences.en: Most discarded material is mutilated or destroyed to prevent unauthorized resale elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 大部分注销的资料应加以毁损,以防止未经批准的转售他处.

sentences.en: Please notice if you want to use my photo to resale the goods.
sentences.cn: 如果要转卖,需要借图片的朋友,跟我讲一声,不要偷偷把图片拿去.

sentences.en: Purchase are for personal use only and not resale.
sentences.cn: 购买只能用于个人使用,禁止转售.

sentences.en: Resale rights exist, with schools in some cases sharing the profits.
sentences.cn: 有些人购买“学校债券”后转手牟利,有时学校也参与期间,分取部分差价收入.

sentences.en: She learned that her very expensive wardrobe wasn't worth nearly as much on the resale market.
sentences.cn: 坎恩知道,这些昂贵的衣服在二手市场上不再那么值钱.

sentences.en: The customer shall not reproduce other's information for resale and reloading.
sentences.cn: 有擅自复制他人信息转售、转载情事者.

sentences.en: The main reason for ticket resale was that ticket was artificially low priced.
sentences.cn: 门票之所以会被转售,是由于其定价过低.

sentences.en: the resale value of a car
Ticket resale is a kind of common and typical behavior in the sport competition performance market.
sentences.cn: 门票转售是竞赛表演市场一种常见的行为.

sentences.en: We have invested most of our savings in HDB flats bought from the resale market.
sentences.cn: 我们把大部分的储蓄用来在二手市场购置组屋;我们的钱都在这里,我们的孩子在本地学校读书.

sentences.en: We reserved the right of resale in case buyer defaults ( not paid ) within 3 days.
sentences.cn: 请买家订购后在3天内付款,否则订单一律取消.

sentences.en: When food stores close, they go to work, pilfering food for resale on the black market.
sentences.cn: 食品店关门后，他们就行动起来，偷食品拿到黑市上出售。

trans.tran_en: the activity of selling goods that you have bought from someone else
